resources.string: The Creation Space (C-Space) is an area for collaboration and experimentation where WSU students, faculty, and staff can come together to learn new things and work with advanced media technologies on a variety of projects. C-Space promotes a superior user experience through innovative services that support the educational, cultural, and research needs of the University and its community partners. C-Space is located on the first floor of Ablah Library!
Ask at the C-Space Help Desk or at Circulation.
